settings.replaceKeywordwithTag: Remove extracted paragraph keyword with end tag
settings.replaceKeywordwithTagDescriptio: Removes keywords with tagged prefix (ignored if no prefix character) from the extracted paragraph and adds it as a hashtag at the combined note end.
settings.refreshMetaDataDescription: Add extracted note settings and note list to the end of the note for refresh
settings.richtextMetaData: Enable rich text editor compatibility for refresh metadata
settings.richtextMetaDataDescription: Stop refresh metadata from being automatically deleted by the rich text editor
settings.extractAtBulletLevel: Extract content at the bulleted list item level
settings.extractAtBulletLevelDescription: Extracts only the bulleted line with the keyword rather than the full paragraph bulleted list.
settings.ignoreCaseDescription: All notes will be searched for the keyword in any upper or lower case mix
settings.includeHeaders: Include the header of the paragraph extracted
settings.includeHeadersDescription: The H1, H2, etc header will be included with the underlying extraction (if keyword included in header, this is ignored)
settings.includeTaggedNotes: Include all text from notes with tag keyword
settings.includeTaggedNotesDescription: All note content that has a Joplin tag that matches the keyword will be extracted
settings.tagName: Default or Last Used Paragraph Tag or Keyword
settings.tagNameDescription: Default or last used keyword or hashtag text (without prefix) used within the paragraphs.
settings.tagPrefix: Default or Last Used Tag Prefix Character
settings.tagPrefixDescription: Default or last used prefix for hashtags or any custom tags - # is preferred but % or $ can be used.
settings.preserveSourceNoteTitles: Preserve source note titles with back links
settings.preserveSourceNoteTitlesDescrip: Preserves titles and links back to selected notes within the combined note body
settings.embedSourceNoteTitles: Embed source note titles at end of each extracted paragraph
settings.embedSourceNoteTitlesDescriptio: Preserved titles/links are added at paragraph ends vs. as title links (Preserve Titles will be set to enabled)
settings.combinedNoteTitle: Title of the extracted paragraphs note
